attributes.action: Name and shame the 'devil brothers' and their parents!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give their two young victims some dignity and respect and name and shame the evil pair and there parents.  That is the least the Government can do to try and make up to the two victims after failing them so badly!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
